overview:
Jerry has more than 25 years of software industry experience. Prior to joining Verisae, Mr. Dolinsky served as Executive Vice President of Worldwide Field Operations for Retek, Inc., a leading provider of software solutions for the retail industry.

During his tenure with Retek, he played key roles in helping the annual sales grow from under $10 million to nearly $200 million, which led to a successful IPO and ultimately the sale of Retek to Oracle Corporation in 2005 for almost $700 million.

Most recently, Jerry served as an executive for New York based startup Knoa Software, which provides solutions in End User Performance Management.
